vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.3.20;
son of: Zerubbabel (H2216);
brother of: Meshullam (H4918H), Hananiah (H2608L), Shelomith (H8019I), Ohel (H0169), Berechiah (H1296), Hasadiah (H2619), Jushab-hesed (H3142), Abiud (G0010)
§ Hashubah = "consideration"
a son of Zerubbabel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Zorobabel; tribu de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
哈舒巴 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "思考"
米書蘭的兒子, 所羅巴伯的孫子 (代上 3:20)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
哈舒巴 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "思考"
米书兰的儿子, 所罗巴伯的孙子 (代上 3:20)
